meta.description: Russian-German language tandem club in Cologne

content.paragraph1: This is the name (pronounced like 'Yasha') of our language tandem club that we organise for Russian and German speakers in Cologne.

content.paragraph1: The tandem-langauge club Jascha is organised by two friends: Andrey and Wilhelm. Together, they have come up with the idea in 2022.
content.paragraph2: 'Jascha' is simply the name of the language tandem club and its mascot, the polar bear Jascha.
